summary: Implemented all improvements from the comprehensive review plan: Added error handling to observers with try-catch blocks, replaced DB::raw() with selectRaw() for security, implemented comprehensive caching layer for ranking service (30 min TTL), search endpoints (1 hour TTL), and category lists (24 hours TTL), added cache invalidation in observers and controllers, created unit tests for Calendar, Ranking, Badge, and Revenue services, added feature tests for package usage, consultation credit, and cancellation fee, and created comprehensive API documentation. All changes maintain backward compatibility and follow Laravel best practices.
current_status: All planned improvements have been successfully implemented. The module now has enhanced error handling, improved security, performance optimizations through caching, comprehensive test coverage, and complete API documentation. The module is production-ready with all recommended enhancements in place.
